ClassDesc: Notification style for media custom views that are decorated by the system Instead of providing a media notification that is completely custom, a developer can set this style and still obtain system decorations like the notification header with the expand affordance and actions. Use @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomContentView_E@, @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomBigContentView_E@ and @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomHeadsUpContentView_E@ to set the corresponding custom views to display. Contrary to @B_android#app#Notification#MediaStyle_E@ a developer has to opt-in to the colorizing of the notification by using @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setColorized_E@. To use this style with your Notification, feed it to @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setStyle_E@ like so:
